title: pageConfig
description: Tells orgasmo how to render a page

pageId.description: This id must identify uniquely the pageConfig whithin the data source

staticPath.description: Use it for path exact matching. The page config must have or staticPath or dynamicPath, but not both or none

dynamicPath.description: Use it for path pattern matching (see path-to-regexp). The page config must have or staticPath or dynamicPath, but not both or none

name.description: The name of the dynamic component that will render the page

getMeta.description: Driver method to override the meta

getCssVars.description: Driver method to override the cssVars

mode.description: The rendering mode: "static" means that all the items will be SSR-ed. "grow" means that only the first ssrSize items will be SSR-ed, and then more items will be mounted as the user scrolls, "bubble" means that only the ssrSize will be SSR-ed and as the user scrolls items will be mounted and unmounted to keep in the DOM only those in the viewport.

ssrSize.description: The amount of items server-side rendered (SSR-ed)

threshold.description: The extra pixels above and under the viewport to trigger the mounting and unmounting of components.

items.description: The list of items to be mounted in the block.

getItem.description: The driver method for getting extra items. It's not for overriding the items. If the array has 10 items, this method is used to get the item 11th, 12th, etc.

expiration.description: Amount of miliseconds that a cache is valid, after that period it will be flushed.

revalidation.description: A request after this period will return the cached value, and trigger a revalidation to update the value

autorefresh.description: Refresh the cached value when it's time to revalidate

roles.description: Controls the access based on user roles

cannot.description: Users with any of these roles cannot get this pageConfig, they might still get another pageConfig for the same path.

must.description: Users without all of these roles cannot get this pageConfig, they might still get another pageConfig for the same path.

getFlowControl.description: Driver method that overrides the pageConfig.flowControl
